Segment.name: N7A
Segment.comment: To identify the accessorial equipment required to load or unload product

Field.name: LoadOrDeviceCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the device required to load or unload product

Field.name: Length
Field.comment: Largest horizontal dimension of an object measured when the object is in the upright position

Field.name: HoseTypeCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the type of hose required for loading or unloading the product

Field.name: InletOrOutletMaterialTypeCode
Field.comment: Code indicating the type of material used in the construction of the inlet or outlet

Field.name: InletOrOutletFittingTypeCode
Field.comment: Code indicating the type of fitting required to make the connection of the inlet or outlet

Field.name: MiscellaneousEquipmentCode
Field.comment: Code indicating the miscellaneous equipment required to load or unload a product
